Articles.Content:
Hi Im Sparky,

I enjoy being outdoors and exploring as well as being a nerd. I'm a huge Dr.Who fan and I occasionally enjoy playing Kerbal. My skill

level in Kerbal is well lets just say there is no skill level I just enjoy crashing things. I did however introduce Kerbal to my boyfriend who has now

ever since been extremely addicted to it. Well I plan on blogging about my fun adventures and the crazy fun explosions that I create in the game. I hope you

will enjoy reading about all the fun adventures that I post in the future.

Love,

Sparky :confused:

Ah, good to have another Whovian! Starting to get lonely. Who's your favorite regeneration?

Also, welcome aboard!

Hi Im Sparky,

I enjoy being outdoors and exploring as well as being a nerd. I'm a huge Dr.Who fan and I occasionally enjoy playing Kerbal. My skill

level in Kerbal is well lets just say there is no skill level I just enjoy crashing things. I did however introduce Kerbal to my boyfriend who has now

will enjoy reading about all the fun adventures that I post in the future.

Love,

Sparky :confused:

Welcome aboard!

And:
nooooooooooooooooooooo whatever you do don't blink

Ah, good to have another Whovian! Starting to get lonely. Who's your favorite regeneration?

Also, welcome aboard!

I think David Tennant would have to be my favorite doctor so far. Who's your favorite doctor?

Oh god...

*shrinks into background whilst not blinking*
Whovian? One of us, one of us, one of us.
